name: Light 'Em Up (RandomPirate774)
description:
Light 'Em Up is a Halloween-themed topdown-shooter. You play as a monk, and you have to defend a dungeon from all kinds of enemies. SACRIFICE your enemies' dead bodies to regain hp/energy. Light torches to damage nearby enemies and score points.

This game was made for the Spooktober Game Jam 2021.

Thanks to DaddyEnjoyer for playtesting the game.

Some photos from Shutterstock were used to create the sprites.

The Wind sound effect is from ZapSplat.

Tools used:

  • Godot Engine
  • GIMP
  • Audacity
